overview: A film about a lonely child and the self-absorbed parents: "What shall we do with little Jill? Imagine sitting in a chair all day. Maybe we should give her something nice - a picture"? But a picture can not want to speak with - or? In the picture sits a girl who wants a horse - and Jill goes into the world to find.
title: What Shall We Do About Little Jill
